title: Is it generally fine for one's health to donate plasma once or twice a week? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is usually recommended that you wait for at least 3 weeks to regenerate new cells.I wouldn't use the blood from a donor giving blood the second time in a week, because the blood count would be much lower than from one that have had time to get more new cells. About health...I guess you could donate once a week for a while if you are male and between 18 and 30. But twice would probably lead to anemia.
Probably not long term. They let people do it because there is no there way to get enough plasma to make the clotting factors and other medicines. The Twisted Business of Donating Plasma
I know people who donated it for money and I think they were only allowed to do it once a week for medical reasons. Not 100% sure.
